column5: Hey everyone, We have an ice fishing trip planned at the end of March. We fish lakes north of Ignace around Silver Dollar. If anyone has snow, ice and slush reports for the area, please post them. We'd sure appreciate any incite. Thank you in advance for any info you provide. Jimmy Mac

Am over west of Ignace by vermilion bay but would imagine our conditions are the same as it is in most of NWO.Lots of snow and lots of slush spots.Need some good sleds to rip through that stuff.Plan on a auger extension as ice and snow build up is high bring some straps or rope..Fishing wise it sounds good everywhere.
